entry.title: Is President Biden a drag on his party? Voters in Virginia may give an answer

media:group.media:title: Is President Biden a drag on his party? Voters in Virginia may give an answer
media:group.media:description: The Virginia gubernatorial race between Democrat Terry McAuliffe and Republican Glenn Youngkin is highlighting early warning signs for Democrats about what lies ahead for the 2022 midterm elections. #CNN #News

entry.title: What does William Shatner think of being called an astronaut?

media:group.media:title: What does William Shatner think of being called an astronaut?
media:group.media:description: William Shatner and the Blue Origin crew speak to CNN's Erica Hill ahead of their trip to space. #CNN #News

entry.title: Merck seeks FDA emergency use authorization for antiviral Covid-19 treatment

media:group.media:title: Merck seeks FDA emergency use authorization for antiviral Covid-19 treatment
media:group.media:description: Merck is seeking FDA emergency use authorization for its experimental antiviral Covid-19 treatment, molnupiravir. If authorized, the drug would be the first oral antiviral treatment to fight Covid-19. CNN's Elizabeth Cohen reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: George Clooney compares Biden's struggles to 'battered child' after Trump presidency

media:group.media:title: George Clooney compares Biden's struggles to 'battered child' after Trump presidency
media:group.media:description: In a BBC interview, George Clooney recalls knowing Donald Trump before his presidency. Chief media adviser to George W. Bush and John McCain campaigns Mark McKinnon reacts to the actor's account. #CNN #News

entry.title: CNN Films' ‘The Lost Sons’: Discussion with Executive Producer Paul Fronczak

media:group.media:title: CNN Films' ‘The Lost Sons’: Discussion with Executive Producer Paul Fronczak
media:group.media:description: CNN Films presented a special virtual panel discussion following the broadcast premiere of “The Lost Sons”. CNN Anchor, Laura Jarrett, moderated the discussion featuring film subject & Executive Producer, Paul Fronczak. #CNN #News

entry.title: Republican establishment embraces Trump in Iowa

media:group.media:title: Republican establishment embraces Trump in Iowa
media:group.media:description: US Sen. Chuck Grassley and other Republican officials joined former President Donald Trump at a rally in Des Moines, Iowa. Trump gave his “complete and total endorsement” to Grassley’s bid for reelection in 2022. #CNN #News

entry.title: Video shows police officers dragging Black paraplegic man from car

media:group.media:title: Video shows police officers dragging Black paraplegic man from car
media:group.media:description: A Black paraplegic man, Clifford Owensby, has filed a complaint with the NAACP after video showed police officers pulling him out of his car by his hair and arms during a traffic stop on September 30 in Dayton, Ohio. #CNN #News

entry.title: ‘Despicable’: Iraq war survivor reacts to upcoming controversial video game

media:group.media:title: ‘Despicable’: Iraq war survivor reacts to upcoming controversial video game
media:group.media:description: 'Six Days in Fallujah' will profit off Iraq War survivors' trauma, critics say. Developers argue it teaches history. CNN'S Brianna Keilar talks with Iraq war survivor Najla Bassim Abdulelah. #CNN #News

entry.title: Sydney residents celebrate 'freedom day' after 100 days of lockdown

media:group.media:title: Sydney residents celebrate 'freedom day' after 100 days of lockdown
media:group.media:description:
Australia's biggest city Sydney has emerged from 100 days of Covid-19 lockdown. Fully vaccinated residents can now go to pubs, gyms, restaurants and shops. The city of more than five million people have been in strict lockdowns since June. CNN's Angus Watson reports.
#CNN #News #CNNi

entry.title: Blocks of lava as large as buildings roll from volcano

media:group.media:title: Blocks of lava as large as buildings roll from volcano
media:group.media:description:
Blocks of lava as large as three-story buildings have rolled down the hillside of the island of La Palma in Spain's Canary Islands. The lava has been flowing for more than three weeks, and tremors are still being felt in the area. CNN's Robin Curnow speaks with Ben Ireland who was on the ground when the volcano first erupted.
#CNN #News #CNNi

entry.title: Is it safe to go trick-or-treating this Halloween? Dr. Fauci weighs in

media:group.media:title: Is it safe to go trick-or-treating this Halloween? Dr. Fauci weighs in
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, the chief medical adviser to President Biden, speaks with CNN's Dana Bash about what you can do to be safe on Halloween this year during the pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: 'Yes or no?': Bash presses Facebook exec on platform's role on January 6

media:group.media:title: 'Yes or no?': Bash presses Facebook exec on platform's role on January 6
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Dana Bash questioned Facebook Vice President of Global Affairs Nick Clegg about whether the platform amplified pro-insurrection voices leading up to the riot at the US Capitol on January 6.
#CNN #News

entry.title: 'Disgusting, pathetic': Avlon reacts to Scalise moment from Fox News interview

media:group.media:title: 'Disgusting, pathetic': Avlon reacts to Scalise moment from Fox News interview
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Jim Acosta speaks with John Avlon and Margaret Hoover about former President Donald Trump hinting at a 2024 presidential run during a rally in Iowa and how members of the GOP fuel the belief that President Joe Biden's 2020 election win was illegitimate.
#CNN #News

entry.title: See what Trump said about Mitch McConnell at Iowa rally

media:group.media:title: See what Trump said about Mitch McConnell at Iowa rally
media:group.media:description:
Former President Donald Trump took aim at Senate Republican Leader Mitch McConnell during an Iowa rally for not supporting Trump's attempts to overthrow the 2020 presidential election. CNN's Jim Acosta discusses Trump's rally with Trump biographer Michael D'Antonio.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Stelter: Right-wing media repeats news instead of reporting it

media:group.media:title: Stelter: Right-wing media repeats news instead of reporting it
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brian Stelter says that the erosion of mistrust is high among Republicans in part because right-wing media outlets like Fox News and OAN rely on repeating information instead of doing their own reporting of the facts.
#CNN #News
